description: Approval of details pursuant to condition 4 (Construction Method Statement) of planning permission ref: P2016/1383/FUL granted on appeal ref: APP/V5570/W/17/3181452 dated 09/05/2018 for 'Demolition of existing garages and erection of a three-bedroom single family dwelling house including excavation at basement level with associated landscaping; erection of boundary wall and provision of cycle and refuse storage.'
decision_conditions: Your attention is drawn to the fact that it is noted that section 1of the CMP advises that the contractor would meet with Local residents prior to the main works commencing on the site, to engage and reassure the residents to allay their concerns regarding the construction works. Lines of communication would also be confirmed. However, it is noted that the CMP also advises that any Saturday works would be limited to specific tasks (when arising), and are not currently allowed for within the construction programme. The applicant is advised that Saturday working is avoided wherever possible.
